name: test_e2e_with_logs[580_GQL_FRAG_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `GQL_FRAG_002` |
| **Name** | GraphQL inline fragment with schema introspection |
| **Category** | GRAPHQL |
| **Subcategory** | fragment |
| **Severity** | `MEDIUM` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `query{user{...on Admin{__schema{types{name}}}}}`
